title: The name of your CSA
images: One or more images to appear in a slideshow, with optional captions. Large images make the page much slower to load, so it's great if the images can be scaled down to the size they would be on a computer screen (can scale with Microsoft Paint for example)
info: Key-value pairs providing information about the CSA
description: One or more paragraphs describing the CSA. Paragraphs are easier to read if kept to around 100 words or less.
